subject: Tennis
Rogers Cup (Tennis)
Tennis
Rogers Cup (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: As she has done seven times this Grand Slam season, Williams played a listless first set, falling behind the 26th-ranked Flavia Pennetta of Italy before rallying in a persistent wind for a 2-6, 6-3, 6-0 second-round victory at the Rogers Cup.
snippet: As she has done seven times this Grand Slam season, Williams played a listless first set, falling behind the 26th-ranked Flavia Pennetta of Italy before rallying in a persistent wind for a 2-6, 6-3, 6-0 second-round victory at the Rogers Cup.
